channel.title: Gnome on joh.fi
channel.description: Recent content in Gnome on joh.fi

item.title: My first patch to GNOME
item.description: I’ve used open source software for many years now but I haven’t really contributed back to any of the open source communities. I have filled some bug reports but other than that I’ve been simply a happy (and sometimes less happy) user. However yesterday I took the first step by doing tiny tiny contribution to GNOME or to be specific to gnome-session. The funny thing is that it was all because of selfish reasons.
